alert.note: Alert for Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains; Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 22 at 2:08AM MST until November 24 at 6:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 6 inches, with isolated amounts of 8 to 12 inches above pass level in the Tobacco Root Mountains and Gallatin and Madison Ranges. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains and Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 6 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility, especially Thursday afternoon and evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.

area.areaDesc: Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains; Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains
